Class ViewImagesBigger

java.lang.Object
interfaces.ViewImagesBigger
public class ViewImagesBigger
extends java.lang.Object
Shows the images like a pictures viewer
Author:
Yolanda

      public ViewImagesBigger​(javax.swing.Icon image, java.util.List<javax.swing.ImageIcon> listImages, java.awt.Component tp, boolean selectALgo)
      Creates the tab that shows the image selected in its full size
      Parameters:
      image - selected image
      listImages - images of the new images created by the algorithms
      tp - the parent of this component and the place where it is going to be shown
      selectALgo - true if algorithm comparer view to create a comparer

      Parameters:
      imagesInPredicctions - paths of the images tiff in prediction folder
